about_the_game:
Imagine, how could spirits and mythical creatures feel these days? What if they were closer, than it could seem? Perhaps, your classmate nearby or a guy selling you street food may appear as one of them.

This is a story about Kot - a house spirit in the shape of a cat. It’s lost its owner and his powers leave him insensibly. It has to find a new owner to survive before they disappear. But what if he meets a lost kitten? Or a restless soul? Or a thirsting demon hunting the weakend hero’s energy remains?

Here you can control the character’s fate and the events of the story. Make your choice, fights with demons, save kittens and punish villains All in your paws.

House spirit cat is a visual novel with interactive elements.
Game features:
  • Multiple endings, non linear playthrough
  • Original soundtracks
  • Fairy tale characters in the modern world
  • Cats!
